alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 13 at 11:59AM MDT until October 14 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Winds will decrease this afternoon. Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 are expected late tonight. * WHERE...Limon, and Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Disconnect hoses and drain sprinkler systems.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
